member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmMainMenu.btnStart_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Create a RandList of Questions using the manually-input prompts and answers, then start the quiz.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmMainMenu.btnFile_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Create a RandList of Questions using a user-selected file, then start the quiz.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmMainMenu.PromptFile
member.summary: Prompts the user for a .txt quiz file.
member.returns: The selected file as a String.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmMainMenu.FormQuestions(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a RandList of Questions from a file address.

member.name: T:Study_Aid.frmMainMenu
member.summary: The first form opened in the application. Sets up the quiz.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.Question.Copy(Study_Aid.Question)
member.summary: A static/shared function that returns a copy of the input Question.
member.returns: A copy of the original Question.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.Question.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A constructor that takes a prompt and answer as String.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.Question.GetPrompt
member.summary: Returns the prompt String.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.Question.GetAnswer
member.summary: Returns the answer String.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.Question.HasBeenWrong
member.summary: Returns whether or not the Question has been answered incorrectly.
member.returns: True if the Question has been answered incorrectly, False otherwise.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.Question.MarkWrong
member.summary: Sets the Question as having been answered incorrectly.

member.name: T:Study_Aid.Question
member.summary: A class containing a prompt String, answer String, and Boolean value of whether or not the question has been answered incorrectly.

member.name: T:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.Status
member.summary: An enumerated type that tracks what state the form is currently in.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.#ctor(Study_Aid.RandList{Study_Aid.Question})
member.summary: A custom constructor for frmQuiz that takes a RandList of Questions as an argument.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.GetQuestion(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a single Question from lstQuestions. May or may not return the previous Question to the RandList.
member.param: Whether or not the previous Question should be returned to the RandList.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.DisplayPrompt
member.summary: Displays the prompt from qstCurrent.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.DisplayAnswer
member.summary: Displays the answer from qstCurrent.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.DisplayOver
member.summary: Displays the quiz completion message and allows the user to choose to retake the test.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.FixButtons
member.summary: Ensures the correct buttons are being displayed for the form's current status.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.btnCont_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Display the answer if in Prompt status or end the application if in OverNoWrong status.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.btnYes_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Display a new Question or the over message if in Answer status or open a new quiz if in OverWrong status.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.frmQuiz.btnNo_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Display a new Question if in Answer status or close the application if in OverWrong status.

member.name: T:Study_Aid.frmQuiz
member.summary: The form that hosts the quiz.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Study_Aid.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.RandList`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds an item of generic type T to the contents of the RandList.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.RandList`1.Remove
member.summary: Removes and returns a random item from the contents of the RandList.
member.returns: A random item of type T.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.RandList`1.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the contents of the RandList.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.RandList`1.IsEmpty
member.summary: Determine whether or not the contents of the RandList are empty.
member.returns: True if empty, False if not.

member.name: M:Study_Aid.RandList`1.GetCount
member.summary: Returns the number of items in the RandList.

member.name: T:Study_Aid.RandList`1
member.summary: A list data type that returns a random one of its values with the Remove function.
